com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components

Class Dialogs.DialogAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.components.Dialogs.DialogAction
  • Enclosing class:
    Dialogs

    public abstract static class Dialogs.DialogAction
extends Object
    Used to specify the properties of a button in a dialog. Handles the action when the button is clicked and allows the dialog to stay open when a button is clicked if desired.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dialogs.DialogAction

        public Dialogs.DialogAction(String name)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • performed

        public abstract boolean performed(GDialog dialog)
        Called when button clicked, before dialog is disposed. Will be in the Dispatch (Swing) thread.
        Parameters:
        dialog - that this action is called from. If you wish to display another dialog as a result of the action you should set this dialog as its parent. This will ensure the new dialog will be in front of the current one.
        Returns:
        true if the action was successful and the dialog should be disposed. False if the action was unsuccessful and the dialog should not be disposed.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object obj)

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the enabled state of the DialogAction. When enabled, the button associated with this object is active and can be clicked.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if this DialogAction is enabled

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns the enabled state of the DialogAction. When enabled, the button associated with this object is active and can be clicked.
        Returns:
        true if this DialogAction is enabled
